text: Classroom; Students sit at desks; Teacher stands at the front smiling.
Teacher addresses the class.
Medium shot – Daniel and Claire turn towards each other.
Hello, I’m Daniel Vella. That’s V-E-L-L-A. What’s your name?
Nice to meet you, Daniel. I’m Claire Borg. B-O-R-G.
Two-shot of Daniel and Claire.
Where do you live, Claire?
I live in Valletta, on Republic Street. What about you?
I live in Rabat, close to the church. What is your phone number?
Claire smiles. Daniel listens carefully.
When’s your birthday?
On the 10th of July. I’m fourteen. I was born in Valletta. And you? When were you born?
I was born on the 3rd of May. I’m fifteen.
Close-up alternating between Daniel and Claire.
Do you come from a big family?
No, I don’t. I live with my parents and my sister. My dad is a teacher and my mum works in a bank. What about your family?
I live with my parents and my younger brother. My dad is a driver and my mum is a shop assistant.
Both students laugh lightly.
Have you got any pets?
Yes, I have. I’ve got a dog. And you?
I’ve got a cat and a hamster.
Claire leans forward a little, interested.
What do you like doing in your free time?
I like playing football and reading comics. My sister prefers music. What about you?
I love swimming, and my brother plays computer games.
Friendly atmosphere, both smiling.
What are you like?
I think I’m friendly but a bit shy. What about you?
People say I’m easy-going.
Students keep chatting, class in the background.
Who’s your best friend?
My best friend is Mark. He’s funny and kind.
What does he look like?
Mark is tall and slim. He’s got short blonde hair and blue eyes. Have you got a best friend?
Yes, it’s Maria. She’s my neighbour. She’s very smart and helpful. She’s got brown hair and green eyes.
